verbose_text: Cellular study showed that (i) the NF-kappaB activity induced by poly (I : C) was upregulated in Myd88 overexpressing cells and unaffected in Myd88 inactivated cells; (ii) Myd88 overexpression inhibited and upregulated the expression of poly (I : C)-induced antiviral genes and inflammatory genes respectively; (iii) Myd88 inactivation enhanced the expression of the antiviral genes induced by poly (I : C).
